It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 44 inline typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::point_iterator 45 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 46 find(key_const_reference r_key) 47 { 48 node_pointer p_found = find_imp(r_key); 49 if (p_found != base_type::m_p_head) 50 splay(p_found); 51 return point_iterator(p_found); 52 } 53 54 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 55 inline typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::point_const_iterator 56 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 57 find(key_const_reference r_key) const 58 { 59 const node_pointer p_found = find_imp(r_key); 60 if (p_found != base_type::m_p_head) 61 const_cast<PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC* >(this)->splay(p_found); 62 return point_iterator(p_found); 63 } 64 65 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 66 inline typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::node_pointer 67 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 68 find_imp(key_const_reference r_key) 69 { 70 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ONLY(base_type::structure_only_assert_valid(__FILE__, 71 __LINE__);) 72 node_pointer p_nd = base_type::m_p_head->m_p_parent; 73 while (p_nd != 0) 74 if (!Cmp_Fn::operator()(PB_DS_V2F(p_nd->m_value), r_key)) 75 { 76 if (!Cmp_Fn::operator()(r_key, PB_DS_V2F(p_nd->m_value))) 77 return p_nd; 78 p_nd = p_nd->m_p_left; 79 } 80 else 81 p_nd = p_nd->m_p_right; 82 return base_type::m_p_head; 83 } 84 85 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 86 inline const typename PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC::node_pointer 87 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 88 find_imp(key_const_reference r_key) const 89 { 90 PB_DS_ASSERT_VALID((*this)) 91 node_pointer p_nd = base_type::m_p_head->m_p_parent; 92 while (p_nd != 0) 93 if (!Cmp_Fn::operator()(PB_DS_V2F(p_nd->m_value), r_key)) 94 { 95 if (!Cmp_Fn::operator()(r_key, PB_DS_V2F(p_nd->m_value))) 96 return p_nd; 97 p_nd = p_nd->m_p_left; 98 } 99 else 100 p_nd = p_nd->m_p_right; 101 return base_type::m_p_head; 102 } 103 #endif
